full_description:
HUAWEI MatePad SE WiFi 4GB RAM 128GB Storage 10.4-inch Tablet

The HUAWEI MatePad SE 10.4-inch is a versatile and feature-packed tablet designed for immersive entertainment and productivity. Powered by a 6nm octa-core processor, it delivers smooth performance for multitasking and running demanding applications. The MatePad SE also features Super Device functionality for seamless connectivity with other Huawei devices, and a multi-window feature for enhanced productivity. It boasts a stunning 2K HUAWEI FullView Display with a high screen-to-body ratio, providing vibrant visuals and an immersive viewing experience. The tablet is designed for eye-soothing comfort, with TÜV Rheinland certifications for Low Blue Light and Flicker Free, as well as a 4096-level brightness adjustment. It offers a lightweight and durable design, making it easy to carry and resistant to everyday mishaps.

2K Eye Comfort HUAWEI FullView Display

The HUAWEI MatePad SE features a stunning 10.4-inch 2K HUAWEI FullView Display with a high screen-to-body ratio, providing an immersive viewing experience. With its 2K resolution, 225 PPI, and an 83% screen-to-body ratio, you can enjoy vibrant and detailed visuals. The dual symmetrical speaker system, tuned by HUAWEI Histen 8.0 technology, enhances surround sound and voice clarity for crystal-clear audio in calls, movies, and online classes.

Eye-Soothing Comfort for Extended Use

The MatePad SE is designed with your eye comfort in mind. The 2K screen is certified by TÜV Rheinland for Low Blue Light and Flicker Free, reducing eye strain and fatigue. With 4096-level brightness adjustment, the display automatically adapts to ambient lighting conditions, ensuring comfortable viewing in any environment. Whether you're reading ebooks or using dark mode for nighttime browsing, the MatePad SE keeps your eyes refreshed.

Powerful and Smooth Performance

The MatePad SE is equipped with a 6nm octa-core processor, delivering stable and smooth performance for all your tasks. Whether you're multitasking, streaming content, or running demanding apps, the MatePad SE handles it with ease, ensuring a seamless user experience.

Lightweight and Durable Design

Weighing just 440g, the MatePad SE is lightweight and easy to hold. Its micro-curved middle frame design provides a comfortable grip. The tablet is built to withstand daily mishaps, with a durable body that can handle accidental drops or impacts. You can confidently take it with you wherever you go, knowing it can withstand the rigors of daily use.

Multi-Window for Enhanced Productivity

The MatePad SE offers a multi-window feature that allows you to split the screen or bring up a floating window with a simple swipe. Open multiple app windows simultaneously, making it easy to multitask and stay productive. Watch a video while replying to messages or plan a trip while searching for a guide, all in one device.

Kids Corner for Safe and Fun Browsing

The MatePad SE's Kids Corner provides a safe and enjoyable browsing experience for children. It offers access to BabyBus for nursery rhymes, stories, and games. Parents have control over time limits, app and content management, and can enable posture, brightness, and bumpy road alerts to cultivate healthy digital habits for their children.

full_description:
Huawei MatePad 11 Wi-Fi 6GB Ram 128GB Rom IPS LCD Tablet

The Huawei MatePad 11 Wi-Fi IPS LCD Tablet is powered by the Qualcomm SM8250 Snapdragon 865 5G Octa-core CPU. The smartphone has a 10.95-inch IPS LCD screen with a resolution of 2560 x 1600 pixels. It has 6 GB of RAM and 64 or 128 GB of internal storage. On the back, there is a single 13-megapixel camera. An 8 MP sensor is located on the front of the device. The tablet sensors include an accelerometer, gyroscope, proximity sensor, and compass. The phone is powered by a non-removable Li-Po 7250 mAh battery with fast charging (22.5W) and reverse charging (5W). The phone is powered by the HarmonyOS 2.0 operating system. It has four stereo speakers, USB Type-C 3.1, USB On-The-Go, and Bluetooth 5.1. The Huawei MatePad 11 Wi-Fi 6GB RAM 128GB ROM IPS LCD Tablet comes with a 01-yar warranty.

values.value: TFT LCD (IPS), up to 120 Hz refresh rate
Standard charger: the standard charger supports 10V/2.25A MAX
Bluetooth 5.1, supports BLE, SBC, AAC, and LDAC HD Audio.
WiFi 6, 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/ax, 2 x 2 MIMO, 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz
